priorVersion.title: CDISC Protocol Study Arm Type Value Set Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C174222

self.title: CDISC Protocol Study Arm Type Value Set Terminology

definition: The terminology relevant to the identification of the kind of arm.
name: Study Arm Type Value Set Terminology
preferredTerm: CDISC Protocol Study Arm Type Value Set Terminology
submissionValue: Study Arm Type Value Set Terminology
synonyms: Study Arm Type Value Set Terminology

terms.definition: An arm describing the active comparator.

An arm describing the intervention or treatment plan for a group of participants in the study receiving a control. The control may comprise a non-investigational product (active control) or regimen, placebo, or no treatment.
An arm describing the intervention or treatment plan for a group of participants in the study receiving test product(s).
A study arm without an intervention or treatment.
An arm describing the placebo comparator.
An arm describing the sham comparator.
An arm describing the intervention or treatment plan for a group of participants in the study. Treatment may consist of either experimental or control products under investigation.
